translations.chinese: 南陽守欲自剄，其舍人陳恢曰：「死未晚也。」
translations.english: The Nanyang governor was about to commit suicide, but his aide Chen Hei said: "It is not yet time to die."

translations.chinese: 乃踰城見沛公，曰：「臣 聞足下約先入咸陽者王之，今足下留守宛。
translations.english: So he climbed over the wall to see Pei Gong and said: "I have heard that you promised to enfeoff as king whoever first entered Xianyang. Now you remain besieging Wan.

translations.chinese: 宛郡縣連城數十，其吏民自以為降必死，故皆堅守乘城。
translations.english: Wan commandery has dozens of walled cities connected together. Its officials and people believe they will certainly die if they surrender, so they all defend their walls firmly.

translations.chinese: 今足下盡日止攻，士死傷者必多；
translations.english: If you continue attacking all day, your soldiers who die and are wounded will certainly be many;
Lead your troops away from Wan, and Wan will certainly follow you."
